channel.title: Star Wars on 点滴随记
channel.description: Recent content in Star Wars on 点滴随记

item.title: Nemik's Nanifesto
item.description:
There will be times when the struggle seems impossible.
有時候 斗爭似乎希望渺茫
I know this already.
我很清楚這一點
Alone, unsure, dwarfed by the scale of the enemy.
孤獨 迷茫 面對龐然大物般的敵人
Remember this.
但記住
Freedom is a pure idea. It occurs spontaneously and without instruction.
自由是一個純粹的理念 它自然發生 不需要指導
Random acts of insurrection are occurring constantly throughout the galaxy.
隨機的反抗行為 在銀河系全境不斷發生
There are whole armies, battalions that have no idea that they’ve already enlisted in the cause.
數不清的戰士們還不知道 他們早已加入這項事業
Remember that the frontier of the Rebellion is everywhere.
記住 起義的戰線無處不在
And even the smallest act of insurrection pushes our lines forward.
哪怕最小的反抗 也會推動我們的戰線向前發展
And then remember this.
還要記住
The Imperial need for control is so desperate because it is so unnatural.
帝國喪心病狂 渴望控制一切
Tyranny requires constant effort.
暴政需要持續的維護 因為它違背自然規律
It breaks, it leaks.
就像堤壩會開裂漏水
Authority is brittle.
權威是脆弱的
Oppression is the mask of fear.
壓迫的背后是恐懼
Remember that.
記住這一點
And know this, the day will come when all these skirmishes and battles,
要知道 總有一天 這些零星的沖突和戰斗
these moments of defiance will have flooded the banks of the Empire’s authority and then there will be one too many.
這些反抗將匯成洪流 沖垮帝國的權威 之后便一發不可收拾
One single thing will break the siege.
只要最后一擊就可以推倒高墻
Remember this.
記住這一點
Try.
竭盡全力

Nemik's Manifesto - "The Rebel Cause"
(Andor) Nemik's Manifesto | Tribute

FYI:

  • Nemik’s manifesto
  • WIKI: Andor (TV series)
  • Reddit: Felt like making a poster for Nemik’s manifesto.
